select lec_t.title, lec_t.content, lec_t.price, lec_t.img, lec_t.rank ,ins_t.name as teacher, ctg_t.name as category from lecture lec_t, instructor ins_t, category ctg_t where lec_t.i_no = ins_t.i_no and lec_t.ctg_no = ctg_t.ctg_no and ctg_t.name = #{category_name} order by lec_t.l_no desc
